host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser Azure SQL Database via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure SQL Database service using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure SQL Database service using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Microsoft Azure SQL Database using Azure CLI or RestAPI.**

Available host templates and related services:

|Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase|
|---|
|App-Resources|
|Connections|
|Deadlocks|
|Connections|
|Health|
|Sessions|
|Storage|
|Workers|

This Pack includes a Host Discovery rule

**Plugin pack pour superviser Microsoft Azure SQL Database via la CLI ou la RestAPI Azure.**

Modèles d\'hôte disponibles et leurs services :

|Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase|
|---|
|Database-Status|

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.04.2 or later
* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure SQL Database

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le statut associé à la base de données.}

{EN: Check database state.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Health

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle la taille de la base.}

{EN: Check database size.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Storage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le nombre de workers.}

{EN: Check the number of workers.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Workers

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle la présence de deadlocks.}

{EN: Check database for deadlocks.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Deadlocks

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le nombre de sessions utilisées.}

{EN: Check sessions usage.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Sessions

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les métriques CPU et Mémoire de l'App (seulement disponible pour les bases vCore - General purpose).}

{EN: Check App CPU and memory metrics (only available with vCore based model - General purpose).}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-App-Resources

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le nombre de connexion par statut.}

{EN: Check the number of connections.}
service_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Database-SqlDatabase-Connections
